title: Doccano crashes / is unresponsive in browser
body:
Hello all!
First of all, thank you for the awesome annotation tool!
I was previously working with doccano < 1.5.0 and everything was working fine. More than a year later I came back and installed the current version of doccano. 

After starting the Webserver via command line and creating a project/importing files, doccano crashes every time after some minutes (1-2 minutes). I tried different browsers (Safari, Chrome, Brave) and different versions of doccano (v1.6.0, v1.7.0, v1.8.0) and every time the same crash after some minutes. I also tried to reproduce this behaviour with extensive scrolling in the documents and clicking through the documents quickly but it seems it crashes only after some time. I also don't get any error messages in console, only browser is unresponsive and I can't refresh.

Is there something I am missing?

Any help is highly appreciated!

How to reproduce the behaviour
---------
Doccano crashes after a few minutes working.

My Environment
---------
*   Operating System: macOS 12.4
*   Python Version Used: 3.9.4
*   When you install doccano: v1.8.0
*   How did you install doccano (Heroku button etc): pip install
